biotools.summary: dbCAN-PUL is a data repository of prokaryotic CAZyme-containing gene clusters that have been experimentally validated to act on a carbohydrate substrate.

bioschemas.name: dbCAN-PUL
bioschemas.summary: dbCAN-PUL is a data repository of prokaryotic CAZyme-containing gene clusters that have been experimentally validated to act on a carbohydrate substrate.
